changelog: Added changes for the new AP 0.6.0 Logic.
Unlockers now are logically accounted for, and will actually turn green if you get sent all 8 or can access a shop that sells them. Yes, that's how the logic works.
Humor and Blkmnd now tracked and can be logically required. Humor code is still in the location name because I can.
Undernet 7 BMDs are now *all* AP items. Bug Digi about creating the WWW Island IDs as AP locations if you want everything autotrackable.
Corrected Legendary Tomes rewards being flipped internally.
Implemented automatic job step clearing once the relevant location is marked as checked.
Fixed incorrect OOL Access rules for Finding the Blue Navi.
Added OOL rule for Beachnet in the event that you *gasp, shock* actually get 4 passes to take the metro there.
Corrected the Legendary Tomes job to require Press to start. No more balance beam practice required.
Added OOL rule for Stamp Collecting to the beach Stamp location. It now flags yellow like the rest of the beach when the bad idea can occur.
PNGs now deflated even further, saving ~30% file size thanks to Nivomi.
Thanks to Phantom5800, we are now functional in EmoTracker.
Fixed Undernet logic to require you to actually be able to get there again, instead of assuming that Beach and Press are good enough.
Lots of little stuff corrected or clarified across the board.
Added Metro Station-style map to show region connectivity
Added OOL access to a few chips that are reasonably easy to farm (Ex, Yai's telephone has a 50% chance at Bubbler C)
Split up the DNN Station into 1F and 2F, because half the checks aren't very clear from names alone.
Also added OOL access to Beach via the undernet for masochists. ðŸŽµtake the long way homeðŸŽµ
Corrected Beach's Stamp collecting step to be the Beach stamp instead of Yoka's again. They don't have much else there, but at least they have this stamp now.
Job - Help with a Will now has the correct number of steps.
Clarified Comedian logic again, which means Digi will likely implement humor shuffle ASAP
Added OOL access to chip trades that you can get from the OrderSys. Screw farming for anything that's not recov 30 * though (30% chance in a GMD in ACDC3)
Job - Help Me With My Son step 2 map typo corrected.
Job - Transmission Error now requires needle for Yoka Access for step 2
ACDC Stamp Collecting Progbot typo preventing visiblity fixed
ðŸŽ¶Secret Secret, implemented Secret (zones)ðŸŽ¶
Also fixed a couple of naming inconsistencies for Jobs that weren't prefixed with Job
Bugfix for Yoka WWW Door logic.
Added outlines for Press and the Spins
Debated starting a band called 'Press and the Spins'
Resolved crash of poptracker when attempting to use the Scilab Job board to undo job steps.
Bugfixes for logical issues w/jobs.
Implemented Jobs Tracking for each step of each job. Made them pretty while I was at it too.
Manual tracking of jobs is required, as job steps are not part of AP's tracking
Undernet and Deep Undernet logic now correctly match underlying AP logic.
After 10,000 years in limbo, we've finally reached the AP release of BN3.
Further bugfixes for autotracking typos, corrected recov30 * logic.
Also fixed the hospital 1 BMD names once and for all... Until Digi breaks them again.
Corrected location changes / autotracking disparities, added School Desk check to ACDC.
Resolved incorrect logical access for BeachNet -> Hospital Island BMD and Tamako's PC BMDs.
Removed nonexistent checks from initial beta tests
Fixed logic for SciLab WWW BMD, Villain location
BeachNet Logic exists now
Implemented Autotracking and Alpha logic
Chocolate Shop added
Chip trades now have logic
added WWW Island map
Higsby's Gatcha has approximate logic
Initial Stable release
